title: Winter
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris, TV Ed Productions and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: This program hosted by Trevor Lunn and Kevin Koala invite guests to explain just what is Winter and how does the season affect us and the plants and animals around us. These guests come from the Melbourne Museum Education Service, Royal Melbourne Zoo Education Service and the Victorian Schools Nursery.
